        ID  Name   Type   Path  
        1   local  local  /tmp

        bafkreie7q3iidccmpvszul7kudcvvuavuo7u6gzlbobczuk5nqk3b4akba  700                 800       test4.car    

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose prep list-pieces 1

1             1                
    SourceStorage
        ID  Name   CreatedAt            UpdatedAt            Type   Path  Config  
        1   local  2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  local  /tmp  <nil>
